summary: This is a supplement to our report, Mining on Federal Lands: More Than 800 Operations Authorized to Mine and Total Mineral Production Is Unknown , GAO-20-461 . It provides additional data on each of the individual operations authorized to produce solid minerals such as gold, phosphate, and coal on federal lands as of September 30, 2018. It also contains information such as the state in...
title: Supplemental Material for GAO-20-461R: Data on Solid Mineral Operations on Federal Lands
